column5: This scenic room on the first floor is perfect for a single person. The room includes a twin bed, night stand, large dresser with mirror, small portable closet, and great view of the water fountain. It also includes access to a shared bathroom with a Jacuzzi bathtub.   Our guests have access to a large kitchen, refrigerator (used exclusively by Airbnb guests), dining room, living room, billiard room, library, study, and scenic backyard as well as DVDs, CDs, records, books and board games.
column8: Hospitality Room in Quiet Home near The Woodlands
